name: The Edge of Daylight
description:
A young Irish man wakes in his grandmother's house, smells smoke, and goes to investigate. Short point-and-click adventure game. ~5 minute playtime. Please post any bugs or issues in the comments below.

The Edge of Daylight is based on a level I made in Dreams on PS4 (video here), which is in turn based on a short story I wrote (which you can read here), which is in turn based on a real dream I had. The location is based heavily on my real grandmother's house, and textures/paintings/photographs are based on real ones, but she and her house are nice and not creepy.

If I get a few players willing to play this, I may expand on this experience (as a separate project), do a version of my similarly strange novel "Burnt Cake", or somehow merge the two. Thanks for playing!

PS. Secret Easter Egg for reading this far: press Z for a debug camera!
